page.title: 11Social Survey (Home Life)
page.content: The household equipment possessed by {100%}of the families in the survey is as follows: fridge, washing machine, oven, electric kettle, radio, camera and calculator. {92%}also have a freezer, telephone and colour television. In the kitchen{90%}have an electric mixer or food processor,{82%} an electric toaster, and{31%}a microwave oven. {51%}have an electric blanket. The popularity of leisure equipment is as follows: Cassette recorder { 85%} Music centre / stereo systems {77% Black and white television {62% } Record player { 56% Video recorder {36% Computer {31% Piano { 31%
